pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:0.6: Ime kho panāyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena hatthako sakyaputto vādakkhitto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.3: So titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.4: Titthiyā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—“kathañhi nāma hatthako sakyaputto amhehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānissati, paṭijānitvā avajānissati, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarissati, sampajānamusā bhāsissati, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ titthiyānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena hatthako sakyaputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.7: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, āvuso hatthaka, titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāsi, paṭijānitvā avajānāsi, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarasi, sampajānamusā bhāsasi, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.8: “Ete kho, āvuso, titthiyā nāma yena kenaci jetabbā;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.10: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.11: “kathañhi nāma hatthako sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānissati, paṭijānitvā avajānissati, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarissati, sampajānamusā bhāsissati, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.14: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, hatthaka, titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāsi, paṭijānitvā avajānāsi, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarasi, sampajānamusā bhāsasi, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.17: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānissasi, paṭijānitvā avajānissasi, aññenaññaṃ paṭicarissasi, sampajānamusā bhāsissasi, saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:1.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.1.2: visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa vācā, girā, byappatho, vacībhedo, vācasikā viññatti, aṭṭha anariyavohārā—adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ meti, assutaṃ sutaṃ meti, amutaṃ mutaṃ meti, aviññātaṃ viññātaṃ meti, diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ meti, sutaṃ assutaṃ meti, mutaṃ amutaṃ meti, viññātaṃ aviññātaṃ meti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.1.8: na ghānena ghāyitaṃ, na jivhāya sāyitaṃ, na kāyena phuṭṭhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.1.16: ghānena ghāyitaṃ, jivhāya sāyitaṃ, kāyena phuṭṭhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.1: Tīhākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.2: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.3: Catūhākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.4: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.5: Pañcahākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.6: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.7: Chahākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.8: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.9: Sattahākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.10: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ, vinidhāya bhāvaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.13: aviññātaṃ viññātaṃ meti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.14: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.18: sattahākārehi “aviññātaṃ viññātaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.2.19: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ, vinidhāya bhāvaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.1: Tīhākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhañca me sutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.2: tīhākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhañca me mutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.3: tīhākārehi “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhañca me viññātañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.6: tīhākārehi adiṭṭhaṃ “diṭṭhañca me sutañca mutañca viññātañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.9: tīhākārehi assutaṃ “sutañca me diṭṭhañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.12: tīhākārehi assutaṃ “sutañca me mutañca viññātañca diṭṭhañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.15: tīhākārehi amutaṃ “mutañca me sutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.18: tīhākārehi amutaṃ “mutañca me viññātañca diṭṭhañca sutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.21: tīhākārehi aviññātaṃ “viññātañca me mutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.3.24: tīhākārehi aviññātaṃ “viññātañca me diṭṭhañca sutañca mutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.4.4: viññātaṃ “aviññātaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.3: tīhākārehi diṭṭhaṃ “viññātaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.6: tīhākārehi diṭṭhaṃ “sutañca me mutañca viññātañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.9: tīhākārehi sutaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.12: tīhākārehi sutaṃ “mutañca me viññātañca diṭṭhañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.15: tīhākārehi mutaṃ “sutaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.18: tīhākārehi mutaṃ “viññātañca me diṭṭhañca sutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.21: tīhākārehi viññātaṃ “mutaṃ me”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.5.24: tīhākārehi viññātaṃ “diṭṭhañca me sutañca mutañcā”ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.1: Tīhākārehi diṭṭhe vematiko diṭṭhaṃ nokappeti, diṭṭhaṃ nassarati, diṭṭhaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.2: sute vematiko sutaṃ nokappeti, sutaṃ nassarati, sutaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.3: mute vematiko mutaṃ nokappeti, mutaṃ nassarati, mutaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.4: viññāte vematiko viññātaṃ nokappeti, viññātaṃ nassarati, viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti … viññātañca me diṭṭhañcāti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.5: viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti … viññātañca me sutañcāti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.6: viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti; viññātañca me mutañcāti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.7: viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti; viññātañca me diṭṭhañca sutañcāti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.8: viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti; viññātañca me diṭṭhañca mutañcāti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.9: viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti; viññātañca me diṭṭhañca sutañca mutañcāti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.13: sattahākārehi …pe… viññātaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti, viññātañca me diṭṭhañca sutañca mutañcāti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc1:2.6.14: pubbevassa hoti “musā bhaṇissan”ti, bhaṇantassa hoti “musā bhaṇāmī”ti, bhaṇitassa hoti “musā mayā bhaṇitan”ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ, vinidhāya bhāvaṃ.
